segments.text: I hate landing in the sand trap ! Now I'm probably going to waste strokes getting it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At least you haven't landed in the water yet . I've done that on the last two holes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you hand me my wedge ? I'll try ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go . I'll wait for you to get on the green before I putt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . you go ahead and putt it out . Then I'Il go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way , Mary . I'm going to let you go first . I don't want the pressure of putting first .
segments.speaker: S2
